content: this double thick tunisian crochet potholder is an easy pattern that works up quickly this is a wonderful and practical addition to any kitchen pattern comes with full color photo tutorials as well as several video tutorials **the pattern is free with ads on my website ** > but you can also purchase the ad-free > printer-friendly pdf here on ravelry > this pattern can also be found in my > crochet membership which includes over > 300 patterns and 100s of video > tutorials you can join the membership > here 1 ***you can also get this pattern in the tunisian ebook with 32 additional crochet patterns and 18 stitch tutorials and tips right here 2 *** 1 https //www nickishomemadecrafts com/crochet/the-crochet-club/ 2 https //nickinhc--nickishomemadecrafts thrivecart com/tunisian-beginner-guide/ ref=ravelry
